alert.note: Alert for Clark (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 21 at 12:52PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of south central Nevada and southern Nevada, including the following counties, in south central Nevada, Lincoln and Nye. In southern Nevada, Clark. * WHEN...Until 315 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1244 PM PDT, Minor flooding likely continues across southern Nye County as heavy rainfall has tapered off. Extensive areas of standing water exist along with water over some roads. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pahrump, Mercury, Beatty, Spring Mountains, Lathrop Wells, Amargosa Valley, Indian Springs, Willow Creek Campground, Mountain Springs, Sandy Valley, Goodsprings and Mt. Potosi. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
